post.subject: Character Event Warps: Lien on Life, Lease on Fate & Thorns of Scented Crown
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/07/01/62ef30d616f556f1b4efb39bd96c090e_2722325161792529774.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"219488"}},{"insert":"Hello, Trailblazers!
Character Event Warp Period for this phase is 2024/07/10 12:00:00 – 2024/07/30 15:00:00 (server time) and includes the following content:

▌"Lien on Life, Lease on Fate" Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Jade (Erudition: Quantum) and 4-star characters Serval (Erudition: Lightning), Natasha (Abundance: Physical) and Asta (Harmony: Fire) will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/07/10 12:00:00 – 2024/07/30 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Jade (Erudition: Quantum)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Serval (Erudition: Lightning)
Natasha (Abundance: Physical)
Asta (Harmony: Fire)

▌Character Event Warp: Thorns of Scented Crown"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Argenti (Erudition: Physical) and 4-star characters Serval (Erudition: Lightning), Natasha (Abundance: Physical) and Asta (Harmony: Fire) will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/07/10 12:00:00 – 2024/07/30 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Argenti (Erudition: Physical)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Serval (Erudition: Lightning)
Natasha (Abundance: Physical)
Asta (Harmony: Fire)

※ Among the above characters, the limited character will not be available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star character Jade (Erudition: Quantum) can only be obtained from the Character Event Warp "Lien on Life, Lease on Fate," while the limited 5-star character Argenti (Erudition: Physical) can only be obtained from the Character Event Warp "Thorns of Scented Crown."
※ This Warp is considered a Character Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star character in any Character Event Warp will always be carried over to other Character Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.

▌Temporary Early Access for Material Stages"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Event Period: 2024/07/10 12:00:00 – 2024/08/06 14:59:00 (server time)
●Event Details: During the event period, Ascension and Trace Material stages for Jade (Erudition: Quantum) and Argenti (Erudition: Physical) will be made prematurely available. If Trailblazers haven't unlocked these stages, they can use the "Interastral Peace Guide - Survival Index" to challenge the stages directly.
●Available This Period:
Stagnant Shadows: Shape of Roast, Shape of Perdition
Calyx (Crimson): Bud of Erudition (Penacony Grand Theater), Bud of Erudition (Rivet Town)

▌Character Trial Event: Aptitude Showcase"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Requirement: Unlock Travel Log
●Event Period: 2024/07/10 12:00:00 – 2024/07/30 14:59:00 (server time)
●Event Details: Trial characters Jade (Erudition: Quantum), Argenti (Erudition: Physical), Serval (Erudition: Lightning), Natasha (Abundance: Physical), and Asta (Harmony: Fire) can be used to experience stages. Upon completing the challenges, Trailblazers can obtain Stellar Jade, Adventure Log, Universal Enhancement Material, and Credit.
"}]

lang_subject.ru-ru: Прыжки события Персонажа: «Жизнь в залог, судьба в аренду», «Колючий венец отваги»
lang_subject.ko-kr: 캐릭터 이벤트 워프: 「목숨을 건 담보, 운명을 건 계약」, 「가시관의 아름다운 훈장」
lang_subject.vi-vn: Bước Nhảy Sự Kiện Nhân Vật: Khế Ước Định Mệnh, Vương Miện Gai Góc
lang_subject.fr-fr: Sauts événements de personnages « Pacte du destin » et « Subjugation de la couronne d'épines »
lang_subject.th-th: กิจกรรมวาร์ปตัวละคร "ทอชะตาสัญญาชีวิต", "กิตติคุณมงกุฎหนาม"
lang_subject.de-de: Figuren-Aktionswarps: „Pfand auf Leben, Pacht auf Schicksal“ und „Krone des Dornenwegs“
lang_subject.en-us: Character Event Warps: Lien on Life, Lease on Fate & Thorns of Scented Crown
lang_subject.id-id: Event Warp Karakter: "Perjanjian Hidup dan Takdir" dan "Aroma Mahkota Mawar"
lang_subject.ja-jp: イベント跳躍・キャラクター：「生命と命運の質商」、「荊冠と勲章」
lang_subject.es-es: Saltos de evento de personaje «Fragante corona de espinas» y «Fragante corona de espinas»
lang_subject.pt-pt: Salto Hiperespacial de Evento de Personagem: Vida Prometida, Destino Concedido e Espinhos de Coroa Perfumada
lang_subject.zh-cn: 角色活动跃迁：「质生契运」、「荆冠芳勋」
lang_subject.zh-tw: 角色活動躍遷：「質生契運」、「荊冠芳勳」

user.introduce: May This Journey Lead Us Starward
